Lokitā：1．Lokitā． A Singhalese princess，sister of Devalā．She married the son of her paternal aunt，Kassapa （later Vikkamabāhu I．），and had two sons，Moggallāna and Loka．Cv．lvii．27f．

2．Lokitā． A princess，daughter of Bodhi and Buddhā．She married Moggallāna and had by him four children：Kitti （afterwards Vijayabāhu I．），Mittā，Mahinda and Rakkhita．Cv．lvii．41．
